  • Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.color used by ca.eandb.jmist.framework 
    Class and Description
    Color
    An immutable sample from a Spectrum, which supports various mathematical operations.
    ColorModel
    A strategy for representing colors.
    Spectrum
    Represents the "color" of something in an abstract sense.
    WavelengthPacket
    An opaque token (opaque in the programming sense, not the visual sense) to use to sample a Spectrum.
  • Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.color used by ca.eandb.jmist.framework.color 
    Class and Description
    CIELab
    A color in CIE Lab color space.
    CIELuv
    A color in CIE Luv color space.
    CIExyY
    A color represented in CIE xyY color space.
    CIEXYZ
    CIE XYZ Tristimulus values.
    CIEYuv
    A color in CIE Yuv color space.
    Color
    An immutable sample from a Spectrum, which supports various mathematical operations.
    ColorModel
    A strategy for representing colors.
    RGB
    An RGB color triple.
    Spectrum
    Represents the "color" of something in an abstract sense.
    WavelengthPacket
    An opaque token (opaque in the programming sense, not the visual sense) to use to sample a Spectrum.
